metaTags.metaDescription: Discover how Cloudflare's Business and Pro plans help small and medium-sized businesses boost security and performance. Get started with Cloudflare today.

metaImage.description: DO NOT REMOVE, THIS IS CLOUDFLARE'S GLOBAL OG META ASSET

relatedBlades.title: Security, performance, and reliability for your website and applications
relatedBlades.copy:
Cloudflare's Pro and Business Plans help optimize your web performance and defend against advanced cyber attacks — while delivering a best-in-class customer experience.

Get exceptional value with every subscription plan.

columnContent.title: Best-in-class WAF
columnContent.description: Cloudflare's Web Application Firewall (WAF)  offers superior protection by analyzing incoming traffic, blocking malicious requests, and blocking OWASP threats like SQL injection, cross-site scripting (XSS), zero-day vulnerabilities.

columnContent.title: Cache Analytics for CDN optimization
columnContent.description: Easily track the site assets that are missing, expired, or ineligible for caching — then use the Cloudflare CDN to increase the number of cached resources and improve site speed.

columnContent.title: Enhanced protection with machine learning
columnContent.description: Cloudflare uses advanced machine learning to track and mitigate sophisticated, evolving cyber threats — from malicious bots and other advanced attackers.

columnContent.title: WordPress plugin
columnContent.description: Enhance the performance of your WordPress site with the Automatic Platform Optimization (APO) plugin for CDN, intelligent caching, and more. Turn it on and go (up to 300% faster).

columnContent.title: Content prefetch for Google Search
columnContent.description: Automatic Signed Exchange enables browsers to prefetch your website on Google's search results page, helping improve your core web vitals and speeding up your website.

columnContent.title: No-code performance tools
columnContent.description: The setup is simple, fast, and intuitive, and you can turn on extra features with a single click.

features.title: 1. Pick a plan
features.description: Choose the plan that best suits your needs and click "Get Started"!

features.title: 2. Create an account
features.description: Set up an account with your email and password.

features.title: 3. Set it up
features.description: Add your site and choose a service plan based on the level of functionality and support you need.

plansList.description: Improve performance, reduce latency, and increase availability for all your applications.

features.title: Up to 100K worker requests and 30 scripts
Enhanced security with Web Application Firewall (WAF) and 20 custom WAF rules

plansList.description: Prioritize security of your site with machine learning models to detect unknown attacks, protection against sophisticated bots and IP based rate limiting.

featureList1.title: Get everything on the Pro plan, plus:

features.title: Enhanced security with Web Application Firewall (WAF) and 100 custom WAF rules
Sophisticated bot management and in-depth analytics
Protect sites against traffic surges with Waiting Room (1) and analyze traffic data with Waiting Room Analytics
Cache bypass on cookie for increased HTML caching
Increased cache refresh frequency (30m minimum cache TTL expiry)
Built-in compliance (PCI, SOC 2 Type II and SOC 3 compliance)
Machine learning powered WAF Attack Score Lite
Comprehensive view of all HTTP traffic requests with Security Analytics

relatedBlades.quote: Knowing that we don't have to worry about DDoS attacks against our API and gateway servers give us peace of mind to focus on improving our product.

quoteCarousel.quote: "Switching to Cloudflare, our system was 27% faster overnight. We improved our performance right off the bat."
"Cloudflare helps keep us online, provides a faster site experience to our end users and protects our customers' sensitive information."

relatedBlades.description: Get expert help to solve infrastructure and developer challenges

primaryCtaButton.elementName: Cloudflare SBM - Get expert help to solve infrastructure and developer challenges - CTA

features.title: Cloudflare vs Akamai CDN
features.description: Cloudflare offers faster speeds with no trade-offs in security or ease of use.

features.title: Cloudflare vs Google Cloud DNS
features.description: Cloudflare DNS delivers superior performance, high availability, and robust security.

features.title: Cloudflare vs AWS Cloudfront
features.description: Cloudflare offers better performance, simpler management, and cost savings.

content.value: Cloudflare protects and accelerates any website online. Once your website is a part of the Cloudflare community, its web traffic is routed through our intelligent global network. We automatically optimize the delivery of your web pages so your visitors get the fastest page load times and best performance. We also block threats and limit abusive bots and crawlers from wasting your bandwidth and server resources.

accordionElements.title: Where can I learn more about using Cloudflare?

content.value: The easiest way to learn how to use Cloudflare is to sign-up, which takes less than 5 minutes.
The date you first select a paid plan will be the recurring billing date. For example: If you sign up for the first time on January 10, all future charges will be billed on the 10th of every month.
If you currently have a paid plan (e.g. Pro) for one of your domains and upgrade to a higher priced plan (e.g. Business), the following happens:
You will be debited the hourly pro-rata cost of the Business plan until the end of the billing cycle
You will be credited the hourly pro-rata cost of the Pro plan until the end of the billing cycle
At the beginning of the next billing cycle, you will be charged for the full cost of the Business plan
You will receive an invoice upon successful payment of the upgrade

relatedBlades.title: Trusted by millions of Internet properties
